description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Air Charter Service. The average
  contract duration was 0.09 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.4M. The longest
  contract was 0.11 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.1M.
lookup_name: 'AIR CHARTER SERVICE'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '0'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '0%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: 'NA'

s421_mean_contract_value: '1.4M'
s425_max_duration: '0.11'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.1M'
